description: How to make the dough to make pizza (fast version with active dry yeast).

directions.step: Put flour (this can also be up to 50% whole wheat flour) and salt in a mixing bowl.
Mix and make a well in the center.
Put sugar and yeast in the well.
Slowly start pouring the water (lukewarm) into the well and mix with a fork.
Keep mixing and pouring until all the water has been added.
Transfer dough to a wooden board and start kneading the dough, adding flour until the dough does not stick to your hands but is still soft.
Sprinkle flour into the bowl used previously and re-transfer the dough to the bowl; sprinkle some flour on top of the dough, and cover with a towel and leave the dough in a warm place to let it rise.
When the dough has doubled in volume (in about 1-2 hours) re-knead the dough with a little more flour to compact it.
Pizza Dough done! (now pick a topping and you are on you're way!)
